name: Aim
effect: Deal double damage on your next attack, if it’s with a ranged weapon.

name: Backstab
effect: Following a successful Stealth check, use a knife to perform a powerful surprise attack, dealing an additional +2D10 damage to one enemy. Can only be used when not engaged in combat.

name: Bash
effect: After a successful attack, your base damage with two-handed weapons is 2D10 instead of D10.

name: Bounce Throw
effect: You can re-roll one scatter roll when you fail to throw a grenade (or similar item).

name: Breath Control
effect: You can make each Oxygen Pellet last 2 Time Track resets.

name: Calm
effect: Each time you gain Stress you gain 1 less (minimum 1).

name: Careless
effect: When activated, you gain +5 to your attacks this round but you cannot spend Stamina on defensive moves.

name: Charge
effect: You can barge into melee, gaining +5 Skill and +5 damage during your first turn. Cannot be used in conjunction with any form of stealth.

name: Cleave
effect: When wielding a two-handed melee weapon, all enemies adjacent to your target also take half of the rolled damage.

name: Compartmentalized Mind
effect: When you gain a Negative Trait, roll twice and choose the result you prefer.

name: Counter-Attack
effect: While wielding a melee weapon, if you win the combat roll during an opponent's turn your attack automatically causes 1 Wound.

name: Coup de Grace
effect: Gain +D8 damage against knocked-down enemies.

name: Diligent Medic
effect: You may attempt to heal the same Wound twice per Time Track, instead of once.

name: Discerning
effect: You can perform an INT check to determine if someone’s lying or trying to manipulate you.

name: Dual Wielding
effect: Each turn you attack, you may use an off-hand weapon to attack again with disadvantage.

name: Hard to Kill
effect: Gain +1 max Wounds.

name: Ignore Cover
effect: Fire at an enemy behind cover as if they had no cover at all.

name: Lucky
effect: Each time you roll a natural 11 on the D20, you gain 1 Luck. You may not earn Luck any other way.

name: Marksman
effect: Gain +2 damage on ranged attacks.

name: Momentum
effect: Deal an extra +1D6 damage to a downed opponent, in an attempt to eliminate them. If the opponent is eliminated, gain +2 damage for the rest of the combat. This effect stacks with itself.

name: Movement Economy
effect: You only spend 3 Stamina per round while in Stealth.

name: Multi-Target
effect: Target 3 adjacent enemies with a single ranged weapon attack.

name: Neutralize
effect: Carefully observe your opponent, then perform an attack to neutralize one of their unique abilities. If you hit and the damage would surpass the target's CON, they can no longer use that ability. No Wounds are caused with this attack.

name: Overpower
effect: If you roll max damage (e.g. a result of 16 on D10 + 6), you automatically inflict a Wound.

name: Overwhelm
effect: After a knocked-down opponent recovers, their Recovery Status roll is modified by +3.

name: Pack Rat
effect: You perfectly arrange the things in your bag, gaining +2 Gear Slots.

name: Parry
effect: When hit by an attack, roll your weapon's damage. If the damage you roll is equal or higher than the attacker's, you parry it and receive no damage.

name: Point-Blank Expert
effect: You suffer no penalty when using a ranged weapon in melee.

name: Quiet
effect: All rolls on the Site Activity table are reduced by 1 (minimum 1). This effect does not stack.

name: Rend Armor
effect: Tear through an enemy's defenses, causing them to permanently lose 2 Armor.

name: Resilient
effect: You no longer suffer -2 to all actions while injured.

name: Resist the Taint
effect: You may ignore the negative effects of a Taint.

name: Resuscitate
effect: Within 1 minute after another character dies, you may perform a Medical Aid check. If you roll an Impressive success or more, the character is revived. They will remain unconscious for D10+10 hours with 1 Wound remaining.

name: Skill Boost
effect: Gain +5 to your next skill check.

name: Step Where I Step!
effect: You lead the way while sneaking, granting the rest of your team +2 to their next Stealth check.

name: Stout
effect: You have Advantage on all Resolve checks.

name: Strong
effect: Deal +2 extra damage on melee attacks.

name: Targeted Strikes
effect: Gain +1 to all rolls on the Hit Location table.

name: Tough
effect: You roll Recovery checks with +2 WIL.

name: Vigorous
effect: Gain +2 extra Stamina per turn.

name: Weak Spot
effect: Re-roll a damage roll after successfully attacking.

name: Well Connected
effect: You have friends everywhere in Karum Station, granting you a +2 bonus to all Manipulation checks.
